pr_title: Add support for Multiselect Dropdown List Widget
pr_body: Added support for Multiselect Dropdown List Widget (`MLDW` ) by using prototypal inheritance which inherits from the existing `dropdown_list_widget`. Essentially adopted a cleaner methodology than using `if`/`else` ladders within the `dropdown_list_widget` itself (#17674). TODOs: ##### Major - [x] Implement a better way to add check marks to dropdown items. Since, the current methodology interpolates unescaped text into HTML. - [x] Handle scenarios where user triggers the `Reset` button with `MLDW`. - [x] Add tooltip to `MLDW` button displaying all the items checked by user (if the items checked exceeds the `limit`). ##### Minor - [x] Add node tests for MLDW. - [x] Fix failing `list_widget` node tests to regain coverage. - [x] Improve overall styling. - [x] Better commit messages (obviously!) Usage: Initial prototype when implemented in `Move Topic` dropdown as an example! ```js const opts = { widget_name: "select_stream", data: streams_list, default_text: $t({ defaultMessage: "No streams" }), include_current_item: false, value: [current_stream_id.toString()], // Defines the existing items that should be present in dropdown. limit: 3, // Maximum items to display in button. }; ``` Corresponding template: ```hbs {{> dropdown_list_widget widget_name="select_stream" filter_button_text = (t 'Filter') list_placeholder=(t 'Filter streams')}} ``` Yields: ![mldw](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/53977614/122947013-73b9a200-d397-11eb-8214-6034727af067.gif)

The templates (`left_sidebar.hbs` and `right_sidebar.hbs`) are then rendered using `ui_init.js`. 

Fixes parts of #18792.

', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2021, 5, 10, 19, 17, 45, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'timabbott', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 629652602, 'comment_body': "That's because `hotkeys.js` is binded with an `keypress` event and `keydown_util.js` with a `keydown` event.
